3. In how many congresses did the House of Representatives have a Democratic majority?

```{r}
house <- congress[congress$chamber=="house",]

dem_maj <- tapply(house$party, house$congress, function(xx) {
  partytable <- table(xx)
  ndems <- partytable["D"]
  nreps <- partytable["R"]
  moredems <- ndems > nreps
  return(moredems)
})
sum(dem_maj)

```
